post.file: set path = ( /opt/gromacs/bin $path ) if ($?LD_LIBRARY_PATH) then setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /opt/gromacs/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH else setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH /opt/gromacs/lib endif setenv GMXBIN /opt/gromacs/bin setenv GMXDATA /opt/gromacs/share setenv GMXLDLIB /opt/gromacs/lib setenv GMXMAN /opt/gromacs/share/man

export PATH=/opt/gromacs/bin:$PATH if test -n "$LD_LIBRARY_PATH"; then export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/gromacs/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH else export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/gromacs/lib fi export GMXBIN=/opt/gromacs/bin export GMXDATA=/opt/gromacs/share export GMXLDLIB=/opt/gromacs/lib export GMXMAN=/opt/gromacs/share/man
